Plot: At a remote mountain lake a bound man with cemented shoes is being dragged to the water by two other men and his request for a coup de grace escalates into a clash.
Title: Coup de Grâce
Writer: Pascal Glatz, Pascal Glatz, André Küttel (story), André Küttel, André Küttel
Actors: Fabian Guggisberg, Thomas U. Hostettler, Mathis Künzler
